com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl.utils

Class ElementsTagMap<Elem>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl.utils.ElementsTagMap<Elem>
  • Type Parameters:
    Elem - type of the stored elements

    public class ElementsTagMap<Elem>
extends java.lang.Object
    A lightweight utility that encapsulates the functionality of referencing Elements of a UberElement by random tags somehow associated with them.
    Author:
    MarkusSecunds
    See Also:
    UberElement, UberDrawable

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,Elem> map
      The Dictionary object used to store the tags and their associated Elements.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ElementsTagMap() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bindTag(EventDelegate<Elem> adderListener, EventDelegate<?> deleterListener, Function<Elem,java.lang.Object> tagGetter)
      Adds listeners to Element adder and deleter delegates, so that a tag will be associated automatically for each element when it is added and removed when the associated element is removed.
      Elem get(java.lang.Object tag)
      Convenient shortcut for getting Elements from the map by tag.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • map

        public final java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,Elem> map
        The Dictionary object used to store the tags and their associated Elements. Directly accesible for the user to exploit.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ElementsTagMap

        public ElementsTagMap()

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public Elem get(java.lang.Object tag)
        Convenient shortcut for getting Elements from the map by tag. Throws RuntimeException when nothing found to make debugging easier.

      • bindTag

        public void bindTag(EventDelegate<Elem> adderListener,
                    EventDelegate<?> deleterListener,
                    Function<Elem,java.lang.Object> tagGetter)
        Adds listeners to Element adder and deleter delegates, so that a tag will be associated automatically for each element when it is added and removed when the associated element is removed.
        Parameters:
        adderListener - listener called on each element newly added to a collection
        deleterListener - listener called on each element deleted from a collection
        tagGetter - function that generates the tag associated with given Elem instance
